languages.text: {n}Муаран пристально смотрит на вас.{/n} "Если бы со мной говорил {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g}, я бы поверил твоим словам. Но ты всего лишь мон-кай — игрушка собственных страстей. Любая эмоция, охватившая вашу душу, способна вытравить из нее остатки здравомыслия и благородства".

traits.locale_text: {n}Муаран пристально смотрит на вас.{/n} "Если бы со мной говорил эльдар, я бы поверил твоим словам. Но ты всего лишь мон-кай — игрушка собственных страстей. Любая эмоция, охватившая вашу душу, способна вытравить из нее остатки здравомыслия и благородства".

languages.text: {n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honour."
languages.original_text: {n}Муаран пристально смотрит на вас.{/n} "Если бы со мной говорил {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g}, я бы поверил твоим словам. Но ты всего лишь мон-кай — игрушка собственных страстей. Любая эмоция, охватившая вашу душу, способна вытравить из нее остатки здравомыслия и благородства".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Eldar gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words were to come from an Eldar, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out the remnants of reason and nobility."

{n}The Eldar gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words were to come from an Eldar, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out the remnants of reason and nobility."

{n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an Aeldari, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honor."

{n}The Eldar gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an Aeldari, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honor."

{n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an Aeldari, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honor."

{n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honour."

languages.text: {n}穆兰仔细地凝视着你。{/n}“如果这些话是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}说的，我会相信。可你只是个猴子而已。你是你激情的傀儡，任何占据你灵魂的情感，都足以驱散一切理性与荣誉的痕迹。”
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}穆兰仔细地凝视着你。{/n}“如果这些话是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}说的，我会相信。可你只是个猴子而已。你是你激情的傀儡，任何占据你灵魂的情感，都足以驱散一切理性与荣誉的痕迹。”

languages.text: {n}ムアランはこちらをじっと見つめる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}がこうした言葉を発する分には、信用できたがな。お前は所詮モン＝ケイだ、己の熱情にもてあそばれる者にすぎぬ。お前の魂を支配するあらゆる感情は、理性と道徳を跡形もなく消せるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}ムアランはこちらをじっと見つめる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}がこうした言葉を発する分には、信用できたがな。お前は所詮モン＝ケイだ、己の熱情にもてあそばれる者にすぎぬ。お前の魂を支配するあらゆる感情は、理性と道徳を跡形もなく消せるのだ」

languages.text: {n}Muaran blickt dich konzentriert an.{/n} "Kämen diese Worte von einem {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, würde ich sie glauben. Aber Ihr seid nur ein Chem-Pan-Sey – ein Spielball Eurer eigenen Leidenschaften. Jedes Gefühl, das von Eurer Seele Besitz ergreift, kann alle Spuren von Vernunft und Ehre vertreiben."
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran blickt dich konzentriert an.{/n} "Kämen diese Worte von einem {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, würde ich sie glauben. Aber Ihr seid nur ein Chem-Pan-Sey – ein Spielball Eurer eigenen Leidenschaften. Jedes Gefühl, das von Eurer Seele Besitz ergreift, kann alle Spuren von Vernunft und Ehre vertreiben."

languages.text: {n}Muaran vous fixe d'un regard intense.{/n} « J'aurais volontiers cru ces mots s'ils sortaient de la bouche d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, mais vous n'êtes qu'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh, le jouet de vos propres passions. La moindre émotion qui se saisit de votre âme peut effacer toute trace de raison et d'honneur en vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran vous fixe d'un regard intense.{/n} « J'aurais volontiers cru ces mots s'ils sortaient de la bouche d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, mais vous n'êtes qu'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh, le jouet de vos propres passions. La moindre émotion qui se saisit de votre âme peut effacer toute trace de raison et d'honneur en vous. »

languages.text: {n}Muaran te mira fijamente.{/n} «Si esas palabras provinieran de un {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, las habría creído. Por desgracia, no eres más que un{mf||a} mon-keigh, y por tanto esclav{mf|o|a} de tus pasiones. En cuanto te posea una emoción, desaparecerá todo atisbo de raciocinio y honor».
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran te mira fijamente.{/n} «Si esas palabras provinieran de un {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, las habría creído. Por desgracia, no eres más que un{mf||a} mon-keigh, y por tanto esclav{mf|o|a} de tus pasiones. En cuanto te posea una emoción, desaparecerá todo atisbo de raciocinio y honor».

languages.text: {n}Muaran pür dikkat sana bakıyor.{/n} "Eğer bu sözleri söyleyen bir {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} olsaydı samimiyetine inanırdım. Fakat sen mon-keigh'sin... Hırsının kölesisin. Duyguların ruhunu ele geçirince kafanda ne akıl kalır ne de onur."
languages.original_text: {n}Muaran gazes at you intently.{/n} "If these words had come from an {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, I would have believed them. But you are merely a mon-keigh — a plaything of your own passions. Any emotion that takes hold of your soul can drive out all trace of reason and honour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Muaran pür dikkat sana bakıyor.{/n} "Eğer bu sözleri söyleyen bir {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} olsaydı samimiyetine inanırdım. Fakat sen mon-keigh'sin... Hırsının kölesisin. Duyguların ruhunu ele geçirince kafanda ne akıl kalır ne de onur."
